Part 2: Cylindrical Object with Flat Top and Bottom Construct a cylindrical object with a central hole and a flat top and bottom. Part 3: Three-Dimensional Rectangular Prism with a Flat Top and Bottom Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom.
